title: Zero Trust Security Model

post_assessment.question: What is the primary purpose of Zero Trust Security Model?
options: To eliminate all security risks in cloud
To understand and mitigate security threats in cloud systems
post_assessment.explanation: Zero Trust Security Model focuses on understanding and mitigating security threats specific to cloud systems. It complements traditional security controls.

post_assessment.question: Which of these is a key security concern in cloud?
options: None - this domain has no security risks
post_assessment.explanation: Zero Trust principles is a critical security concern that must be addressed in cloud systems.

post_assessment.question: What is the best practice for securing cloud systems?
options: Rely on a single security control
Implement defense-in-depth with multiple layers of security
Disable all security features for performance
post_assessment.explanation: Defense-in-depth is essential - multiple layers of security controls provide better protection than any single control.
